snippet: Fighting was reported at the Lebanon border and in Aleppo on Sunday as Turkish forces fired back into Syria for the fifth consecutive day in retaliation for cross-border shelling.
abstract: Intense fighting breaks out in Syria near Lebanon border and in Aleppo, while Turkish forces fire back into Syria for fifth consecutive day in retaliation for cross-border shelling.

byline.contributor: Hwaida Saad and Hania Mourtada contributed reporting from Beirut, and Hala Droubi from Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates.

lead_paragraph: Fighting was reported at the Lebanon border and in Aleppo on Sunday as Turkish forces fired back into Syria for the fifth consecutive day in retaliation for cross-border shelling.

headline.seo: Rebels Clash With Syrian Security Forces Near Lebanon
headline.main: Rebels Clash With Syrian Security Forces Near Lebanon
headline.print_headline: More Clashes For Syria Along Several Of Its Borders
